content:
Can you provide a MATLAB code that generates a list of words with the following criteria:
- The word must have at least two consecutive letters that are the same.
- The word must have at least one letter that is repeated twice but not consecutive.
- The word must contain exactly three vowels and three consonants.
- The word must not be a proper noun or foreign word.
Please generate a list of five words that fit this description using the provided MATLAB code.
